menu.name: Song Options
menu.desc: Specific settings for the songs in the mod.

menu.name: Genesis Options
menu.desc: Toggles for events, shaders, and mechanics in Genesis.

menu.name: Forever Dream Options
menu.desc: Toggles for events, shaders, and mechanics in Forever Dream.

checkbox.name: NTSC Shader
checkbox.desc: If enabled, applies a NTSC shader over the whole game.

checkbox.name: Bloom Shader
checkbox.desc: If enabled, applies a Bloom shader over Stage and snow.

checkbox.name: Glitch Shader
checkbox.desc: If enabled, applies a Glitch shader in certain events and snow too lol.

checkbox.name: Invert Shader
checkbox.desc: If enabled, applies Ivert shader in certain events.

checkbox.name: Game Pixel Shader
checkbox.desc: If enabled, applies a pixel perfect shader over the characters and background.

checkbox.name: UI Pixel Shader
checkbox.desc: If enabled, applies a pixelated shader over all UI elements.

checkbox.name: Flicker Backgrounds
checkbox.desc: If enabled, causes the background to flicker as part of song events.

checkbox.name: Mechanics
checkbox.desc: Disable this if you don't want to experience song mechanics.

menu.name: Premeditated Options
menu.desc: Toggles for events, shaders, and mechanics in Premeditated.

checkbox.name: Pc Mechanics
checkbox.desc: Disable this if you dont want Premeditated to mess with your pc! (Removing the taskbar, changing your wallpaper, etc.)

menu.name: Classic Options
menu.desc: Toggles for events, shaders, and mechanics in Classic.

checkbox.name: Health Drain
checkbox.desc: If enabled, the opponent drains your health whenever they hit a note. Health can be gained back.

checkbox.name: Disable Shaders
checkbox.desc: Disables shaders that my impact on performance.

checkbox.name: Enable Subtitles
checkbox.desc: Enables subtitles for dialogue during the songs.

checkbox.name: Disable Moving Windows
checkbox.desc: Disables instances of moving windows.

checkbox.name: Disable Pause Countdown
checkbox.desc: Disables countdown before resuming song.

checkbox.name: Developer Mode
checkbox.desc: Enables debug_tools.hx, allows for speeding up/slowing down the game. PRESS 1 - Skip Song PRESS 2 - Slows Game By 10% (Min Speed: 10%) PRESS 3 - Resets Game Speed To 100% PRESS 4 - Speeds Game By 10% (Max Speed: 200%) PRESS 5 - Hold To Speed Game By 2000%, Uses BOTPLAY PRESS 6 - Toggle For Botplay On Player Strums

checkbox.name: Reset Humiliation Score?
checkbox.desc: Resets your score for Humiliation (for playtesting/debug purposes, probably remove this later)
